comment:
* A class that aggregates all supported arguments for
 * {@link CameraExtensionSession} initialization.

methods.name: public int getExtension()
methods.comment:
* Retrieve the extension type.
     *
     * @return the extension type.

methods.name: public void setPostviewOutputConfiguration(@Nullable OutputConfiguration postviewOutput)
methods.comment:
* Set the postview for still capture output configuration.
     *
     * @param postviewOutput output configuration for postview
     * @see android.hardware.camera2.CameraExtensionCharacteristics#isPostviewAvailable

methods.name: public OutputConfiguration getPostviewOutputConfiguration()
methods.comment:
* Get the postview for still capture output configuration.
     *
     * @return output configuration for postview
     * @see android.hardware.camera2.CameraExtensionCharacteristics#isPostviewAvailable

methods.name: public List<OutputConfiguration> getOutputConfigurations()
methods.comment:
* Retrieve the {@link OutputConfiguration} list for the capture
     * session.
     *
     * @return A list of output configurations for the capture session.

methods.name: public CameraExtensionSession.StateCallback getStateCallback()
methods.comment:
* Retrieve the CameraCaptureSession.StateCallback
     * listener.
     *
     * @return A state callback interface implementation.

methods.name: public Executor getExecutor()
methods.comment:
* Retrieve the Executor for the CameraExtensionSession instance.
     *
     * @return The Executor on which the callback will be invoked.

methods.name: public void setColorSpace(@NonNull ColorSpace.Named colorSpace)
methods.comment:
* Set a specific device-supported color space. * *

Clients can choose from any profile advertised as supported in * {@link CameraCharacteristics#REQUEST_AVAILABLE_COLOR_SPACE_PROFILES} * queried using {@link ColorSpaceProfiles#getSupportedColorSpaces}. * When set, the colorSpace will override the default color spaces of the output targets, * or the color space implied by the dataSpace passed into an {@link ImageReader}'s * constructor.

methods.name: public void clearColorSpace()
methods.comment: * Clear the color space, such that the default color space will be used.

methods.name: public ColorSpace getColorSpace()
methods.comment:
* Return the current color space.
     *
     * @return the currently set color space, or null
     *         if not set
